attributes.title: Terrible and Racist
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, a bunch of people with maga hats kicked down my door and beat me up for being hispanic and told me to go back to my country 😳😳. When i finally was able to plead with them enough they left and i was able to navigate the app. i cant even navigate without being told racist propaganda and seeing vulgar pictures of sweaty pigs!!! take down this app!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
I tried downloading it but it wouldn’t even show the app on my phone it just said “purchased” like what?! 😠 So I’m just trying to save anyone else from downloading this HORRIFIC app. And without even going into the app I can just tell it’s awful. 😒 The colors they used are disgusting the pictures they put have some weird Oompa Loompa looking guy 🤢 I can’t stand it! It’s terrible. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

- lots of love 🔪✨🥰

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app and opened it for the first time, an obscene and disgustingly disturbing picture of our President’s shrimp popper popped on the screen. It is currently still stuck on the screen and my brand new iPhone 11 now has a virus from the app. I am writing this review using Siri because my phone is still stuck on the horrifying picture! IT IS EXTREMELY REVOLTING.  My cat saw the Cheeto’s dong pic and is projectile vomiting on my carpet. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: I’m revolted.
attributes.review: I downloaded the app expecting it to work out perfectly fine, but it did not. To begin with, it took weeks to download. Another problem was the man on the front page once loading in. Um- Who is he? Didn’t he die or something? I’m confused. Is this a memorial app? If so, I could care less. You won’t be seeing me anytime soon in the app again, so please, let apple delete it. Rot in hell! Teehee XOXO🤩🧚‍♂️💫✨

attributes.title: Slow and awful
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and then took forever to open. Each time I try to enter the app it takes multiple minutes. It has no flow and is hard to use because it is hella confusing. The information on the app is lame so you are bette riff just using his website. I am deleting is and I am disappointed I even wasted my time.

attributes.title: This app made my pet cow die
attributes.review: I’m so upset Donald trump made my pet cow die by me downloading this app. First I pressed download and my cow started to throw up rainbows and I was like what in tarnation that’s wack brotha. Then was happened next was crazyyyyy it sent lasers out of my camera and said Donald trump has now taken over like HUH NO! Then my cow had a seizure and DIED! This app is dangerous and needs to be removed. OUR PRESIDENT IS A COW KILLER. Sounds like a angry vegan to me 👁👄👁....... no more Donald I vote Manny for president!!!

attributes.title: The app killed me
attributes.review: I  was  thinking about  our orange  god and downloaded  the  app  then it  told me to put my grandma in the microwave so I can become a skinny legend so I did it and nothing happened then it said to put metal in the microwave to stop the aliens from coming so I did then after I did green Donald trumps came out of my exploding microwave and the held me in my burning house now I’m in a coffin dead and I’m writing a bad review on the worst app ever

attributes.title: disappointed 😔
attributes.review: so i am extremely disappointed with the app when in the downloading process i wasn’t able to do anything on my phone. my whole screen was frozen for 3 days i called apple on my husbands phone but they said their was nothing they could do and recommend that i wait it out. but the worst part was that it okay horrible music the whole time and made me nauseous. i was throwing up for hours even after leaving my house and j left my phone at home i was still feeling sick. i just wanted to get away from the fake news but the app would even work once i went through hell and back just to have the app.

attributes.title: Worst app shutting my phone down
attributes.review: This the worst app ever made, after the installation of this app my phone started to glitch and I thought nothing of it but as the days continued the glitches became more and got worse to the point where my phone would shut down now. Then I deleted the app thinking my phone would go back to normal but no it shut down completely.

attributes.title: I’m so Mad at this app
attributes.review: First off, if I could rate it negative stars I would! When I first go on the app I’m greeted with a talking fruit that has teeth (much like a developed tumor). Next, it asks me multiple times to show my birth Verdi are as if I’d give such personal info to an app. This app is so trash that the power in my house went out for TWO entire days! I want compensation for the mental distress this app has caused me and my family!
